item.name: Addresses

Get all provinces

This endpoint retrieves all provinces.

Get cities by province ID

This endpoint retrieves all cities belonging to a specific province.

Get barangays by city ID

This endpoint retrieves all barangays belonging to a specific city.
Applications

Submit a new application

This endpoint allows a user to submit a new application.

Get applications by customer ID

This endpoint retrieves all applications for a specific customer.
Authentication

Login a user

This endpoint allows a user to log in using their email and password.

Register a new user

This endpoint registers a new user and their customer details.
Customers

Get customer profile by user ID

This endpoint retrieves a customer's profile based on their user ID.
Email Verification

Show the email verification notice

This endpoint shows the email verification notice.

Verify email address

This endpoint verifies the user's email address.

Resend email verification notification

This endpoint resends the email verification notification.

item.name: GET api/user
Inquiries

Store a newly created Inquiry resource in storage.

This endpoint allows you to submit an inquiry about a product.
Products

Display a listing of the Product resource.

This endpoint allows you to filter products by various criteria and paginate the results.

query.description: The brand ID of the product.
The category ID of the product.
The minimum price of the product.
The maximum price of the product.
The number of items per page.

item.name:
Display the specified product.

This endpoint retrieves a specific product by its slug.

Display a listing of the Categories resource.

This endpoint retrieves a list of all categories.

Display a listing of the Brand resource.

This endpoint retrieves a list of all brands.
Users

Change Password

This endpoint allows a user to change their password.
